code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import Home from"./pages/Home";import CartPage from"./pages/CartPage";import CheckoutPage from"./pages/CheckoutPage";import Navbar from"./components/Navbar";import PageTransition from"./components/PageTransition";import SlideCart from"./components/SlideCart";import CompletionPage from'./pages/CompletionPage';import ProductsPage from'./pages/ProductsPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const[isCartOpen,setIsCartOpen]=useState(false);const addToCart=product=>{setCart([...cart,product]);setIsCartOpen(true);};const clearCart=()=>{setCart([]);setIsCartOpen(false);};const removeFromCart=index=>{setCart(cart.filter((_,i)=>i!==index));};const toggleCart=()=>{setIsCartOpen(!isCartOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-amber-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{cartCount:cart.length,onCartClick:()=>setIsCartOpen(true)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageTransition,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{addToCart:addToCart})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/products",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductsPage,{addToCart:addToCart})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/checkout",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckoutPage,{cart:cart})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/completion",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompletionPage,{clearCart:clearCart})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SlideCart,{isOpen:isCartOpen,onClose:()=>setIsCartOpen(false),cart:cart,removeFromCart:removeFromCart})]})});};export default App;
